import Mathlib

/-!
This file states the following fact (no proof):
Let x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a monotone (increasing or decreasing) sequence which converges, and
assume there exists k : ‚Ñï such that lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} x n = x k. Then x n = x k for all n ‚â• k.
-/

theorem monotone_seq_const_from_k {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {k : ‚Ñï}
  (hmono : Monotone x) (hconv : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù (x k))) : ‚àÄ n, n ‚â• k ‚Üí x n = x k := by sorry

theorem antitone_seq_const_from_k {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {k : ‚Ñï}
  (hmono : Antitone x) (hconv : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù (x k))) : ‚àÄ n, n ‚â• k ‚Üí x n = x k := by sorry
